Item Class: Life Flasks
Rarity: Magic
Compact Gargantuan Life Flask of the Sylvan
--------
Recovers 1065 (augmented) Life over 5 Seconds
Consumes 10 of 75 Charges on use
Currently has 75 Charges
--------
Requirements:
Level: 40
--------
Item Level: 48
--------
50% increased Amount Recovered
Gains 0.25 Charges per Second
--------
Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refill at Wells or by killing monsters.
